name: Carbon Tetrachloride emissions - UNEP
title: Carbon Tetrachloride emissions - UNEP
description: Ozone-depleting substances (ODS) consumption in units of tonnes of ODS, which is the amount of ODS consumed, multiplied by their respective ozone depleting potential value.
